name: Dump Truck Trax Car Crush
description: Here you drive a Dump Truck Trax on mountain landscape and crush as many cars  as you can.When you start a level you get x amount of time to have the crushing fun but as you go along crushing the cars you add on to the time with every car crush.So, if you stop crushing the cars you stop gaining the time and the game ends.The more cars you crush the more your score is at the end of the level.
